T04sanss03u:4: tatrêti saddharmaparigrahe varttamānasyâtmabhāvarakṣā cintyate yathā parān na nāśayet |
T04sanss03u:23: maitrīṃ teṣu kariṣyāmo ye dharmeṣv apratiṣṭhitāḥ |
T04sanss03u:30: dūrato maitram eṣyāmo mā no ruṣyetâiva hi ||
T04sanss03u:33: dānais tathâpi satkāraiḥ paripācyêha tān narān |
T04sanss03u:38: dāntāḥ śāntāś ca muktāś ca grāme 'sminn avatīrya ca |
T04sanss03u:40: sudūram api yāsyāmo dharmakāmān niśamya ca |
T04sanss03u:42: saṃmukhaṃ tatra saṃdṛśya satvānāṃ skhalitaṃ pṛthu |
T04sanss03u:44: asatkṛtāḥ satkṛtā vā merukalpāḥ prabhūya ca |
T04sanss03u:49: badhakān yojayiṣyanti dharmeṣv eṣu hi vartatāṃ |
T04sanss03u:50: ete dharmā na câsmākaṃ saṃvidyante kathañcana ||
T04sanss03u:51: asmākaṃ śramaṇānāṃ hi na ca śrāmaṇakā guṇāḥ |
T04sanss03u:54: codanāṃ bhūtataḥ śrutvā saddharmaṃ te kṣipanti tam ||
T04sanss03u:56: ceṣṭiṣyante tathā teṣāṃ kaścid dharmam imaṃ śṛṇot ||
T04sanss03u:69: ye câpi rājñāṃ puruṣāḥ kuryāt te hi na saṃstavaṃ |
T04sanss03u:71: adhimānīn na seveta [[DOUBT]] vinayec câgame sthitān |
T04sanss03u:75: strīpaṇḍakāś ca ye satvāḥ saṃstavaṃ tair vivarjayet |
T04sanss03u:76: kuleṣu câpi vadhukāḥ kumāryaś ca vivarjayet ||
T04sanss03u:77: na tāḥ saṃmodayej jātu kauśalyaṃ sādhu pṛcchitṛṃ [[DOUBT]] |
T04sanss03u:79: strīpoṣakāś ca ye satvā varjayet tehi saṃstavaṃ |
T04sanss03u:80: naṭair jhallakamallebhir ye cânye tādṛśā janāḥ ||
T04sanss03u:82: vāramukhyān na seveta ye cânye bhogavṛttinaḥ |
T04sanss03u:84: yadā ca dharmaṃ deśeyā mātṛgrāmasya paṇḍito |
T04sanss03u:85: na câikaḥ praviśet tatra nâpi hāsyasthito bhaved iti ||
T04sanss03u:86: ayaṃ câparo 'nartho bhaved yad idaṃ mārakarmôktaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ |
T04sanss03u:87: māraḥ pāpīyāṃs tasya bodhisatvasyâciraṃ yānasaṃprasthitasyântike balavattaram udyogam āpatsyate
T04sanss03u:89: punar aparam ānanda yasmin samaye bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogam āpadyate tasmin samaye mārāḥ pāpīyāṃso bodhisatvasya viheṭhanam upasaṃharanti bhayaṃ saṃjanayanti |
T04sanss03u:93: apy eva nāmâyaṃ bodhisatvo mahāsatvo 'vanīyeta vā
T04sanss03u:96: punar aparam anyavijñānasaṃjñino likhiṣyanti yāvat paryavāpsyanti |
T04sanss03u:97: na vayam atrâsvādaṃ labhāmahe ity utthāyâsanāt prakramiṣyanti |
T04sanss03u:104: punar aparaṃ dharmabhāṇakaś chandiko bhaviṣyatîmāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ lekhayituṃ yāvad vācayitu.ṃ dharmaśravaṇikaś ca kilāsī
T04sanss03u:109: evaṃ dharmabhāṇako mahêccho bhaviṣyati dhārmaśravaṇiko 'lpêcchêti neyaṃ |
T04sanss03u:110: saṃkṣepād dharmabhāṇakadhārmaśravaṇikayor yā kācid vidhuratā sarvaṃ tan mārakarmêty uktaṃ
T04sanss03u:116: punar aparaṃ bhagavan bodhisatvâraṇyako bhavati prāntaśayyâsanâbhirato 'lpêcchuḥ saṃtuṣṭaḥ pravivikto 'saṃsṛṣṭo
T04sanss03u:118: so 'lpârthatayâlpakṛtyatayā ca sukhaṃ viharati na ca
T04sanss03u:119: bāhaśrutyaparyeṣṭāv abhiyukto bhavati na satvaparipākāya na ca dharmaśravaṇe vā dharmasāṃ-
T04sanss03u:121: kathhye vârthaviniścayakathāyāṃ vā vartamānāyāṃ saṃkramitavyaṃ manyate |
T04sanss03u:124: tasyâraṇyavāsena câikârāmaratitayā ca kleśā na samudācaranti |
T04sanss03u:127: sa tatra nâtmârthāya pratipanno bhavati na parârthāya |
T04sanss03u:130: punar aparaṃ bhagavan bodhisatvaḥ kalyāṇamitrapratirūpakāṇi pāpamitrāṇi sevate bhajate paryupāste
T04sanss03u:131: ye hy enaṃ saṃgrahavastubhyo vicchandya puṇyasaṃbhārāt saddharmaparigrahād vicchandya praviveke niyojayanti |
T04sanss03u:134: yasmiṃś ca samaye bodhisatvo vivekavāsena mahāyāne 'bhyudgacchet
T04sanss03u:135: tasmin samaye taṃ bodhisatvaṃ vaiyāvṛtyapalibodhe niyojayanti vaiyāvṛtyaṃ bodhisatvenâvaśyaṃ karaṇīyaṃ ||
T04sanss03u:136: yasmiṃś ca samaye bodhisatvo vaiyāvṛtye saṃniyojayitavyas tasmin samaye viveke niyojayanti
T04sanss03u:139: sacet tvam aṣṭābhir navabhir vā kalpair anuttarāṃ sa-
T04sanss03u:142: na bhūyaḥ śakyasy anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhum |
T04sanss03u:144: bodhisatvo 'tyārabdhena vīryeṇa sthānaṃ khalu punar etad vidyate
T04sanss03u:150: ye 'pi tato 'nye bodhisatvayānīyāḥ pudgalā mārâṅkuśâviddhāḥ pratyaveteṣu dharmeṣu caranti taiḥ sārddhaṃ ratiṃ vindati |
T04sanss03u:151: tathā hi tadanuvarttakā bhavanti sa hīnasevī viśeṣam anadhigato hīnagatiṃ gacchati yad uta dhanvagatiṃ jaḍâiḍamūkagatiṃ yāvad ekādaśo mārâṅkuśêti ||
T04sanss03u:152: yena câivaṃ saṃtatyārabdhavīryasya nirvedāt sarvathā bodhisatvabhāvâiva bhavaty atâiva ratnameghe 'bhihitaṃ |
T04sanss03u:154: tathā cârabhate yathā na kāyakhedaṃ saṃjanayati |
T04sanss03u:159: yad idam alpabalasya gurukarmârambho 'tivelāyāṃ vâparipakvâdhimukter vā duṣkarakarmârambhas tad yathā
T04sanss03u:163: anyathā hi teṣām eva satvānāṃ bodhisatvakhedena bodhicittavījanāśān mahataḥ phalarāśer nāśaḥ syāt ||
T04sanss03u:166: nâpy akālêty ātmabhāvatyāgacittam eva nôtpādyâbhyāsânārambhād dhi na kadācid dadyāt |
T04sanss03u:167: tasmād evaṃ smṛtim upāsthāpya bodhicittaparipācanavirodhibhyo mohāt svârthaghātibhyaḥ piśitâśanebhyaḥ karmakāribhyaś câtmabhāvo rakṣitavyaḥ ||
T04sanss03u:172: kathaṃ ca kulaputrâtra bodhisatvo mārakarmaparihārôpāyakuśalo bhavati |
T04sanss03u:176: apratirūpadeśavāsaṃ lokāyatamantrasevanabhāvanāṃ lābhasatkārapūjôpasthānabahumānaṃ sarveṇa sarvaṃ parivarjayati |
T04sanss03u:177: ye cânye upakleśā bodhipakṣyamārgântarāyikās tān sarveṇa sarvaṃ parivarjayati |
T04sanss03u:187: tena ca kulaputrâitāni sthānāni parivarjayatā na teṣāṃ pudgalānām antike duṣṭacittam utpādayitavyaṃ na pratighacittaṃ nâvamanyanācittam utpādayitavyam |
T04sanss03u:189: uktaṃ hi bhagavatā dhātuśaḥ satvāḥ kāmâdidhātuṃ āsravanti jāyante saṃsyandante saṃsargāc ca vinaśyanti |
T04sanss03u:191: bodhicittasaṃpramoṣo 'py anarthaḥ tasya ca hetur ukto ratnakūṭe |
T04sanss03u:192: caturbhiḥ kāśyapa dharmaiḥ samanvāgatasya bodhisatvasya bodhicittaṃ muhyati |
T04sanss03u:198: ca satvānām avarṇâyaśo 'kīrtyalokaniścāraṇatayā māyāśāṭhyena ca param
T04sanss03u:200: caturbhiḥ kāśyapa dharmaiḥ samanvāgatasya bodhisatvasya sarvāsu jātiṣu jātamātrasya bodhicittam āmukhībhavati |
T04sanss03u:203: yad uta jīvitahetor api saṃprajānan mṛṣāvādaṃ na prabhāṣate |
T04sanss03u:206: adhyāśayena ca sarvasatvānām antike tiṣṭhaty apagatamāyāśāṭhyatayā sarvabodhisatveṣu ca śāstṛsaṃjñām utpādayati |
T04sanss03u:208: yāṃś ca satvān paripācayati tān sarvān anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpayati |
T04sanss03u:216: bodhicittaṃ na riñcati tena sarvāsu jātiṣu |
T04sanss03u:217: svapnântare 'pi taccittaṃ kiṃ punar yadi jāgrataḥ ||
T04sanss03u:220: samādāyêti bodhāya tena cittaṃ na riñcati ||
T04sanss03u:222: caturbhir dharmaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisatvaḥ praṇidhānān na calati ||
T04sanss03u:232: ārocayāmi prativedayāmi vo yathā yathā bahulu
T04sanss03u:234: vitarkayen naraḥ tathā tathā bhavati tannimnacittaḥ tehī vitarkehi tanniśritehîti ||
T04sanss03u:238: idaṃ ca me vīryaṃ parīttaṃ ca kusīdo 'haṃ bodhiś câdīptaśiraścailôpamena
T04sanss03u:241: tan nâham utsahae īdṛśaṃ bhāram udvoḍhuṃ ||
T04sanss03u:248: aham api tathā tathā ghaṭiṣye tathā tathā vyāyaṃsye sarvasatvasādhāraṇena vīryeṇa sarvasatvârambaṇena vīryeṇa yathâham anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyae iti ||
T04sanss03u:250: aparipāciteṣu satveṣu viśvāso bodhisatvasya skhalitaṃ abhājanībhūteṣu satveṣûdārabuddhadharmasaṃprakāśanāt bodhisatvasya skhalitaṃ ||
T04sanss03u:251: udārâdhimuktikeṣu satveṣu hīnayānasaṃprakāśanād bodhisatvasya skhalitam iti |
T04sanss03u:252: samyaksmṛtyupasthiteṣu śīlavatsu kalyāṇadharmeṣu prativimānanā duḥśīlapāpadharmasaṃgrahā bodhisatvasya skhalitam iti ||
T04sanss03u:255: yasyâdhimukti na vidyati buddhadharmagaṇe ca na tasya dhimuktiḥ |
T04sanss03u:256: śikṣavrateṣu na tasya dhimuktiḥ pāpamates tirapāyamukhasya ||
T04sanss03u:257: sêtaś cyuto manujeṣu karmavaśād abudho hi vimūḍhaḥ |
T04sanss03u:258: narakeṣv atha tiryagatīṣu pretagatīṣu ca vindati duṣkham ||
T04sanss03u:261: tatra tathāgatâiva sākṣîti kṛtvā na pratikṣipati |
T04sanss03u:264: anantā buddhabodhir nānâdhimuktikatayā tathāgatānāṃ satveṣu dharmadeśanā pravarttatae iti
T04sanss03u:267: tathāgatapūjāyāṃ ca vaiyāvṛtyam upadiṣṭaṃ tatra yā vṛttiḥ sā ratnarāśisūtrād āgatā |
T04sanss03u:268: tatra vaiyāvṛtyakareṇa bhikṣuṇā sarvabhikṣusaṃghasya cittam abhirādhayitavyaṃ |
T04sanss03u:270: vaiyāvṛtyakareṇa bhikṣuṇā sarveṇa sarvaṃ na karmasamutthānaṃ dātavyaṃ |
T04sanss03u:271: yadi punar āraṇyakasya bhikṣoḥ saṃghaparyāpannaṃ śaikṣakaṃ karma prāpnuyāt |
T04sanss03u:273: anyataro vā bhikṣur adhyeṣyo na punaḥ sâraṇyako bhikṣur utpīḍayitavyas tatra yo bhikṣuḥ piṇḍacāriko bhavati tasya tena vaiyāvṛtyakareṇa bhikṣuṇā praṇītabhojaneṣu saṃvibhāgaḥ kartavyaḥ |
T04sanss03u:277: tasya tena vaiyāvṛtyakareṇa bhikṣuṇânulomikāny upakaraṇāny upasaṃhartavyāni glānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāś ca |
T04sanss03u:278: yasmiṃś ca pradeśe sa yogâcārī bhikṣuḥ prativasati tasmin pradeśe
T04sanss03u:282: praṇītāni ca saṃpriyāṇi yogâcārabhūmyanukūlāni khādanīyabhojanīyāny upanāmayitavyāni ||
T04sanss03u:284: ye bhikṣavo bāhuśrutye 'bhiyuktā bhavanti teṣām utsāho dāta-
T04sanss03u:291: sāṃkathyamaṇḍalaṃ viśodhayitavyaṃ yāvat sādhukārabahulena câsya bhavitavyaṃ ||
T04sanss03u:294: kiyat parīttam api kāryaṃ saṃghamatena kartavyaṃ |
T04sanss03u:295: na svamatena yāvan na sāṃghikaś cāturdiśasāṃghikena saṃsṛṣṭaḥ kartavyaḥ |
T04sanss03u:297: yadi cāturdiśe saṃghe vaikalyaṃ bhavet sāṃghikaś ca lābhôtsado bhavet tena vaiyāvṛtyakareṇa bhikṣuṇā bhikṣusaṃgham
T04sanss03u:300: evaṃ stūpe 'pi pralugne 'yam eva vidhir dāyakān dānapatīn vā
T04sanss03u:302: yadi punaḥ kāśyapa kiyad bahur api staupiko lābho bhavet |
T04sanss03u:303: sa vaiyākṛtyakareṇa na saṃghena cāturdiśasaṃghe upanāmayitavyaḥ |
T04sanss03u:305: yā staupikântaśâikadaśâpi śrāddhaiḥ prasādabahulair niryātitā bhavati |
T04sanss03u:309: kaḥ punar vādo ratnaṃ vā ratnasaṃmataṃ vā yac ca stūpe cīvaraṃ niryātitaṃ bhavati |
T04sanss03u:310: tat tatrâiva tathāgatacaitye vātâtapavṛṣṭibhiḥ parikṣayaṃ gacchatu |
T04sanss03u:311: na punaḥ staupikaṃ cīvaraṃ hiraṇyamūlyena parivartayitavyaṃ |
T04sanss03u:312: na hi staupikasya kaścid argho nâpi stūpasya kenacid vaikalyaṃ yo hi kaścit kāśyapa vaiyāvṛtyakaro bhikṣū ruṣṭacittaḥ
T04sanss03u:315: yadi manuṣyalokam āgacchati dāso bhavati parakarmakaro lābhī ca bhavati khaṭacapeṭapracaṇḍaprahārāṇāṃ
T04sanss03u:320: sa tenâkuśalena karmaṇā bahuśaṅkur nāma pratyekanarakas tatrâsyôpapattir
T04sanss03u:327: tasya tatra jihvêndriye bahūni śaṅkuśatasahasrāṇi ādīptāni ayasmayāni nikhātāni bhavanti |
T04sanss03u:328: yo hi kaścit kāśyapa vaiyavṛtyakaro bhikṣur āgatâgataṃ sāṃghikaṃ lābhaṃ sannidhiṃ karoti na kālânukālaṃ dadāti |
T04sanss03u:331: sa tenâkuśalamūlena jaṅghā nāma gūthamṛtikāpretayonis tatrâsyôpapattir
T04sanss03u:334: sôdvaśyamānas tadbhojanam animiṣābhyāṃ netrābhyāṃ paśyamānaḥ kṣutpipāsāparigato duṣkhāṃ |
T04sanss03u:335: vedanāṃ vetti na ca varṣasahasreṇâpi tasya bhojanasya lābhī bhavati |
T04sanss03u:336: yad api kadācit karhicid bhojanaṃ labdhaṃ-
T04sanss03u:338: bhavati tad uccāraṃ bhavati pūyaśoṇitaṃ vêti ||
T04sanss03u:340: yāṃs tvaṃ saṃgharakṣita satvān adrākṣīḥ kuḍyâkārāṃs te bhikṣavâsan |
T04sanss03u:343: yāṃs tvaṃ saṃgharakṣita satvān adrākṣīḥ stambhâkārāṃs te bhikṣavâsan |
T04sanss03u:346: yāṃs tvaṃ satvān adrākṣīr vṛkṣâkārān patrâkārān phalâkārān te 'pi bhikṣavâsan |
T04sanss03u:347: tair api sāṃghikāni vṛkṣapatrapus.paphalāni paudgalikaparibhogena paribhuktāni tena te vṛkṣapatrapuṣpaphalâkārāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ |
T04sanss03u:350: taiḥ sāṃghikā rajjusammārjanyaḥ paudgalikaparibhogena paribhuktās tena rajjvākārāḥ sammārjany-ākā-
T04sanss03u:353: yaṃ tvaṃ satvam adrākṣīs taṭṭâkāraṃ sa śrāmaṇerakâsīt |
T04sanss03u:356: tair asau dṛṣṭaś ca pṛṣṭaś ca śrāmaṇeraka kim ayaṃ saṃghasya pānakaṃ bhaviṣyati |
T04sanss03u:358: kiṃ na paśyatha taṭṭukaṃ nirmāditaṃ pītaṃ pānakam iti |
T04sanss03u:359: te vṛttā velêti nairāśyam āpannā hīnadīnavadanāḥ prakrāntāḥ |
T04sanss03u:360: sa tasya karmaṇo vipākena taṭṭukâkāraḥ saṃvṛttāḥ ||
T04sanss03u:361: yaṃ tvam satvam adrākṣīr udūkhalâkāraṃ so 'pi
T04sanss03u:365: sa tenôktaḥ śrāmaṇeraka dadasva me khalistākaṃ kuṭṭayitvêti |
T04sanss03u:367: sthavira tiṣṭha tāvan muhūrtaṃ vyagro 'smi paścāt kuṭṭayitvā
T04sanss03u:371: śrāmaṇeraka yadi mama kalpate udūkhalaṃ spraṣṭuṃ tvām evâham udūkhale prakṣipya kuṭṭayeyaṃ
T04sanss03u:375: yady aham asmai prativacanaṃ dāsyāmi bhūyasyā mātrayā prakopam
T04sanss03u:380: jāne tvāṃ kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya pravrajitaṃ śrāmaṇerakaṃ |
T04sanss03u:383: yady apy evaṃ tathâpi tu yan mayā pravrajitena karaṇīyaṃ tat kṛtaṃ |
T04sanss03u:387: apy eva nāmâitat karmaparikṣayaṃ tanutvaṃ paryādānaṃ gacched iti |
T04sanss03u:394: te bhaiṣajyāni kvāthayanto bhikṣubhir apriyam uktāḥ taiś cittaṃ pradūṣya sthālyo bhinnāḥ tena sthālyâkārāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ |
T04sanss03u:395: yaṃ tvaṃ satvam adrākṣīr madhye chinnaṃ tantunā dhāryamāṇaṃ so 'pi bhikṣur āsīl lābhī grāhikaḥ tena mātsaryâbhibhūtena
T04sanss03u:398: yas tu haimantikaḥ sa vārṣikaḥ pariṇāmitaḥ |
T04sanss03u:399: tasya karmaṇo vipākena madhye chinnas tantunā dhāryamāṇo gacchati ||
